honors_and_awards.title: 2nd Runner-Up | Gatbandhan, Red Brick Submit'21 | IIM A
honors_and_awards.description: Stood 3rd in 3000+ teams in Gatbandhan, general management event under IIM A’s Red Brick Submit’21 after completing 3 rounds of case studies & quizzes. Developed a comprehensive strategy for the seamless integration of a large conglomerate with an FMCG company in the final round.
